text: An alternative is to just re-execute every scan again when the txn commits and check whether it gets the same result. — Have to retain the scan set for every range query in a txn. — Andy doesn't know of any commercial system that does this (only just Silo?). | B A E E E e U — 86s ([0 CMU Database Systems - 18 Timestamp Ordering Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
